lyrics:
"Love Somebody" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Love Somebody" (feat. Young Thug) [Hook:] If ya need somebody say yeah yeah And if ya love somebody say hell yea [Verse 1:] I can't even lie, baby girl, you're super cool And I got a crush on you, just like first day of school Every time I bought some shoes, I bought yo ass some shoes Every time I bought some Trues, you got a pair of Trues Thinkin' of me by myself, now girl I'm so confused Tell me why you do the thangs you do the thangs you do I like the way you walk, you walk the way you move Ain't no secret bout it, baby that's what made me choose When you end up here with me Then fuck that shit with screamin' oh Them bitches not shit, mami, them hoes just wanna break us Come on girl, let's fall in love, cause I'm so tired of being tough This might be beginner's luck and I don't wanna fuck it up I'm a get yo hair did, baby, just so I can mess it up Grab that skirt when you get off of work so we can dress it up I'm a be here thick and thin and God ain't gon' keep testing us I say I wouldn't do it again, but I just keep on messing up [Hook:] If ya need somebody say yeah yeah And if she love somebody say hell yea And if ya got somebody say yea yea (And if you love that nigga, say hell yea) (I wanna know) I wanna know if you got em say yea yea (I wanna know) I wanna know if you love em say hell yea (I wanna know) I need to know if you need em say hell yea But if you really love that bitch, say hell yea [Verse 2:] Verse 2, I love you, I trust you, I'll fuck you all ni-ight I'll treat your body ri-ight Buy you black diamonds, no night Have you ever had your name on a seat belt of yo fli-ight 'Cause that bitch belong to you Motherfuck who think they king, baby girl I'm thronin' you La'Tumba ass cologne for you And I ain't neva eva had a girl like you I know what to do with a girl like you That's why I just had a little girl for you You perfect, I might leave Thug's world for you And I can't wait till I get home So you can arma do with that down Arrr, and I can't wait to get in da house Cause I'm a eat that pizza on the couch (Pussy!) (You know what I'm talkin' bout) And I can't wait to get upstairs If I'm a put yo legs in the air And I can't wait till we get done Cause I'm a beat that pussy in the morning if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('

'); } Submit Corrections Writer(s): Radric Delantic Davis, Rodriquez Dejuan Yancy AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics mixtape: "Brick Factory: Volume One" (2014) Cash Shit Aight On Us Paper Problems My Customer Real Gas Say A Prayer Serve On No Love Pour Some More Texas Margarita Bring It On Homeboys Love Somebody NWA Search
